Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are attractive for clean and efficient electricity generation, but high operating temperatures (T-op > 800 degrees C) limit their widespread usage.
Titulo: Ab initio evaluation of oxygen diffusivity in LaFeO3: the role of lanthanum vacancies

Sentencas: Oxygen ion conducting cathode materials (mixed ion-electron conductors, MIECs), such as La1-xSrxCo1-yFeyO3 (LSCF), enable lower Top by reducing cathode polarization losses.
Titulo: Ab initio evaluation of oxygen diffusivity in LaFeO3: the role of lanthanum vacancies

Sentencas: Understanding how composition affects oxygen diffusion in LaFeO3 is vitally important for designing high-performance LSCF cathodes.
Titulo: Ab initio evaluation of oxygen diffusivity in LaFeO3: the role of lanthanum vacancies

Sentencas: To do this, we employ first-principles density functional theory plus U (DFT+U) calculations to show how lanthanum vacancies in LaFeO3 dramatically change the oxygen diffusion coefficient.
Titulo: Ab initio evaluation of oxygen diffusivity in LaFeO3: the role of lanthanum vacancies

Sentencas: Our ab initio results show that A-site substoichiometry is a viable route to increased oxygen diffusion and higher SOFC performance.
Titulo: Ab initio evaluation of oxygen diffusivity in LaFeO3: the role of lanthanum vacancies
